fields.name: extraOptionsKeys
fields.title: Extra Options Keys
fields.description:
Delta-specific options for managing Delta tables and accessing historical data. Examples include:
versionAsOf --> Integer value. Specifies the version of the Delta table to query. This option is used in time travel to get the state of the table at a specific version.
timestampAsOf --> Timestamp value. Specifies the timestamp to query the Delta table at, allowing access to historical data at a specific point in time.
vacuumRetention --> Integer value in hours. Defines the retention period for deleted files in Delta Lake before they are permanently removed during a vacuum operation.
delta.dataSkipping --> 'true' or 'false'. Enables or disables data skipping in Delta Lake, which helps to optimize queries by skipping unnecessary partitions based on query predicates.
